title: 服务器为什么不能用命令方块代码！[1.7.2]
author: LFG

replies.author: LFG
LFG
replies.txt_content: 补充：服务器的那个文件enable-command-block=false   我已经改成true了。

replies.author: intesr
replies.txt_content: 还有  时运32767绝对爆服

replies.author: D-EALIL
replies.txt_content: 是因为你没开启服务器命令方块

replies.author: LFG
replies.txt_content:
D-EALIL 发表于 2015-5-28 16:34
是因为你没开启服务器命令方块
开启了。就是enable-command-block=false   我已经改成true了

replies.author: D-EALIL
replies.txt_content:
LFG 发表于 2015-5-28 16:47
开启了。就是enable-command-block=false   我已经改成true了
那也没办法，把服务器修改成只有op可以作弊试试？

replies.author: LFG
replies.txt_content:
D-EALIL 发表于 2015-5-28 16:48
那也没办法，把服务器修改成只有op可以作弊试试？
